content: LankaTel Fair Usage Policy (FUP) ensures optimal network performance for all users. When you exceed your allocated high-speed data quota, speeds are reduced (not cut off) for the remainder of the billing period. FUP applies to: Unlimited plans, packages with FUP limits, promotional packages. FUP does not mean disconnection - you can continue using at reduced speeds.

Speed reduction after FUP limit: Tier 1 (0-150% of limit): Full speed maintained. Tier 2 (150-200% of limit): Speed reduced to 1 Mbps. Tier 3 (>200% of limit): Speed reduced to 512 Kbps. Example: 100GB FUP plan - Full speed up to 100GB, 1 Mbps from 100-150GB, 512 Kbps beyond 150GB. Speeds reset on billing cycle renewal.

How data usage is calculated: All downloads and uploads counted. Includes: Web browsing, video streaming, app usage, updates, background sync, cloud backup. 1 GB = 1024 MB. Usage calculated in real-time. Rounding: To nearest KB. Both WiFi (on router) and mobile data counted separately. Check detailed usage breakdown in MyLankaTel app.

Check data usage: 1) USSD: Dial *#789# (free, instant). 2) MyLankaTel App: Home > Data Usage (detailed breakdown). 3) SMS: Send DATA to 456. 4) Website: my.lankatel.lk > Usage. 5) Call 1234 option 3. Information shown: Total allocated, Used, Remaining, Reset date, Usage by category (video, social, etc.).

When does data reset? Prepaid: Based on package activation date (e.g., activated 15th, resets every 15th). Postpaid: Aligns with billing cycle (typically 1st of each month). Promotional data: May have different validity (check package details). Anytime data: Same validity as main package. Night data: Resets daily at 6 AM.

LankaTel network peak and off-peak hours: PEAK HOURS: 6 PM - 12 AM (highest usage period). OFF-PEAK HOURS: 12 AM - 6 AM (night), 6 AM - 6 PM (daytime). Impact: During peak hours, network congestion may cause slower speeds even within FUP. Night data packages only count usage during 12 AM - 6 AM. Streaming quality auto-adjusts based on network conditions.

Night data (Unlimited Night / Night Booster): Valid hours: 12:00 AM - 6:00 AM only. FUP: Typically 50-100GB depending on package. Usage outside these hours deducts from main data quota. Auto-switches at 6:00 AM exactly. Sessions started before 6 AM continue using night data until disconnected. Ideal for: Large downloads, updates, backups.

Approximate data usage by activity: Web browsing - 50-100 MB/hour. Social media (scrolling) - 100-200 MB/hour. Social media (video) - 500 MB - 1 GB/hour. YouTube SD - 700 MB/hour. YouTube HD - 1.5-3 GB/hour. YouTube 4K - 7+ GB/hour. Video calls - 500 MB - 1.5 GB/hour. Music streaming - 50-150 MB/hour. Online gaming - 50-100 MB/hour. App updates - varies (can be 100 MB - 1 GB per update).

Tips to reduce data consumption: 1) Set video quality to SD in streaming apps. 2) Disable auto-play videos in social media. 3) Use 'Data Saver' mode in browser and apps. 4) Download content on WiFi for offline use. 5) Disable automatic app updates or set to WiFi-only. 6) Turn off background app refresh. 7) Use compressed data browsers (Opera Mini). 8) Monitor usage regularly via app.

Set up usage alerts: MyLankaTel app > Settings > Usage Alerts. Default alerts at: 80%, 90%, 100% of package. Custom alerts can be set at any percentage. Alert methods: SMS, Push notification. Monthly summary: Sent at end of billing cycle. Daily usage tracking: Available in app (updated hourly). Unusual usage alert: Notifies if usage spikes abnormally.

Add more data before reaching FUP: Available boosters: 1GB - LKR 99, 3GB - LKR 249, 5GB - LKR 399, 10GB - LKR 699, 20GB - LKR 1199. Activation: Dial *#123# > Boosters, or via app. Validity: Same as main package. Priority: Booster data used first before main package. Purchase multiple boosters if needed. Booster data does not carry over.

FUP on 'Unlimited' plans: Unlimited does not mean unrestricted. FUP limits by plan: Unlimited Lite - 100GB FUP, Unlimited Plus - 200GB FUP, Unlimited Max - 500GB FUP, Unlimited Ultra - 1TB FUP. After FUP: Reduced speed, not disconnection. For true unlimited without FUP: Enterprise plans available (contact 1237).

Unused data rollover: Prepaid - No rollover (data expires with package validity). Postpaid Select Plans - Up to 50% unused data rolls to next month. Rollover validity: 1 month only. Rollover data used last (after new allocation). Check rollover eligibility on plan details. Data boosters do not roll over. Promotional bonus data does not roll over.

Share data with family/friends: 1) Dial *#800# > Share Data. 2) Enter recipient LankaTel number. 3) Enter amount to share (min 100MB). 4) Confirm with PIN. 5) Recipient receives SMS confirmation. Limits: Max 5 shares per day, Max 5GB per transaction. Fee: LKR 10 per share transaction. Cannot share: Night data, promotional data, rollover data.

Gift data package to another number: 1) MyLankaTel app > Services > Gift Data. 2) Select package to gift. 3) Enter recipient number. 4) Pay via balance/card. 5) Gift activated on recipient's number immediately. Available for: Standard data packages only. Not available: Night data, promotional packages. Gift message can be included. Recipient receives activation SMS.

Zero-rated apps (no data charged): MyLankaTel app - Always free. LankaTel TV - Free with select plans. Selected partner apps during promotions. Facebook Free Mode - Basic browsing (text only). Important: App store download still uses data. In-app ads may use data. Updates use data. Only specified features are zero-rated.

If you believe data usage is incorrect: 1) Check usage breakdown in app (by date, by app). 2) Identify unusual spikes. 3) Check for background apps consuming data. 4) Verify no unauthorized device access (WiFi). 5) If still disputed: Call 1236 with specific dates/times. 6) Technical investigation within 48 hours. 7) If error found, data credited back.

Using phone as WiFi hotspot: Tethering allowed on all plans. Data consumed from your regular package. FUP applies to tethered usage. Speeds may be lower than direct usage. Tips: Secure hotspot with password, Monitor connected devices, Disable when not in use, Be aware of increased data consumption when sharing.

Enterprise data pool management: Shared data pool across all company lines. Admin allocates limits per user. Overage by individual does not affect others. Pool management via enterprise portal. Usage reports by employee/department. Auto-alert when pool at 80%. Top-up pool: Contact account manager. FUP may not apply (check enterprise agreement).

Data usage while roaming internationally: Charged separately from local package. Rates vary by country (LKR 15-50 per MB). FUP does not apply (charged per MB). Roaming data packs available for savings. Monitor usage carefully - bills can be high. Recommended: Buy local SIM, Use WiFi, Enable data roaming only when needed. Check rates: my.lankatel.lk/roaming before travel.

Optimize video streaming to save data: YouTube - Settings > Video Quality > Data Saver (360p). Netflix - Profile > App Settings > Cellular Data Usage > Save Data. TikTok - Profile > Settings > Data Saver > On. Instagram - Settings > Account > Cellular Data Use > Use Less Data. Facebook - Settings > Media > Never Auto-Play Videos. Estimated savings: Up to 70% data reduction.

Control background data usage: Android: Settings > Apps > [App] > Mobile Data > Disable Background Data. iOS: Settings > Cellular > [App] > Toggle Off. Major data consumers in background: Social media sync, Cloud backups, Email sync, App updates, Location services. Recommendation: Allow background data only for essential apps. Use WiFi for automatic backups and updates.

Apps that compress and save data: Opera Mini Browser - Compresses web pages up to 90%. Google Chrome - Data Saver mode (Settings > Lite Mode). Datally by Google - Monitor and block data per app. Samsung Max - Compresses data and blocks background usage. Bandwidth+ (iOS) - Data usage monitoring. These apps work by routing through compression servers, reducing image quality and removing unnecessary elements.

Prioritize WiFi to save mobile data: Android: Settings > Network > WiFi > Auto-connect to saved networks. iOS: WiFi Assist OFF (Settings > Cellular > WiFi Assist). Smart Switch: Some phones auto-switch to mobile when WiFi is weak - disable if needed. At home/office: Keep WiFi enabled. Travelling: Connect to verified public WiFi networks. LankaTel WiFi hotspots: Free for postpaid customers at 500+ locations.

OS differences in data consumption: Android typically uses more background data (sync, updates). iOS optimizes battery and data better by default. Windows updates can consume 2-5GB per update. Mac updates similar to Windows. Recommendations: Disable automatic OS updates on mobile data. Schedule updates for WiFi connection. Turn off analytics and usage sharing in settings.

Online gaming data breakdown: PUBG Mobile - 20-40 MB per hour of gameplay. Free Fire - 15-25 MB per hour. Mobile Legends - 10-20 MB per hour. Call of Duty Mobile - 30-50 MB per hour. Genshin Impact - 50-100 MB per hour. Note: Game downloads are large (1-10GB). Updates can be 100MB-2GB. Enable 'Download on WiFi only' in game settings.

Social media data usage per hour: Facebook (scrolling) - 100-150 MB. Facebook (videos) - 500 MB - 1 GB. Instagram (browsing) - 150-200 MB. Instagram (reels/stories) - 600 MB - 1 GB. TikTok - 500 MB - 1 GB. Twitter/X - 50-100 MB. LinkedIn - 50-80 MB. Snapchat - 300-500 MB. WhatsApp (text) - 1-5 MB. WhatsApp (video call) - 300-500 MB.

Cloud backup services data usage: Google Photos - High (original quality), Medium (high quality compressed). iCloud - Varies based on content (photos use most). WhatsApp Backup - Can be 1-10GB per backup. Settings to reduce: Enable 'Backup on WiFi only'. Compress photos before backup. Exclude videos from auto-backup. Schedule backups for night (using night data). Selective sync: Only backup important folders.

Managing app updates to save data: Play Store - Settings > Network Preferences > Auto-update > Over WiFi Only. App Store - Settings > App Store > App Downloads > Always Ask. Average app update: 50-200 MB. Major app updates: 500 MB - 1 GB. System apps: Can be 100-500 MB. Recommendation: Update apps weekly on WiFi. Delete unused apps to avoid unnecessary updates.

Email data usage: Text email - 10-50 KB per email. Email with images - 100-500 KB. Email with attachments - 1-25 MB. Tips to reduce: Disable auto-download attachments. Download attachments only when needed. Use 'Load Remote Images' setting. Archive old emails. Unsubscribe from unnecessary newsletters. Business users: Consider email sync frequency (every 15 min vs real-time).

Music streaming data consumption: Spotify Low Quality - 40 MB/hour. Spotify Normal - 70 MB/hour. Spotify High - 150 MB/hour. Spotify Very High - 300 MB/hour. Apple Music - Similar to Spotify. YouTube Music - 70-150 MB/hour. Tip: Download playlists on WiFi for offline listening. Enable 'Data Saver' in streaming app settings. Offline mode uses zero mobile data.

Video calling data consumption: WhatsApp video call - 250-400 MB/hour. Viber video call - 200-350 MB/hour. Zoom (SD) - 500 MB/hour. Zoom (HD) - 1.2-1.5 GB/hour. Google Meet - 600 MB - 1.2 GB/hour. Microsoft Teams - 700 MB - 1.3 GB/hour. FaceTime - 200-400 MB/hour. Tips: Use audio-only when video not needed. Reduce video quality in app settings. Join meetings from WiFi when possible.

Built-in data monitoring: Android - Settings > Network > Data Usage. iOS - Settings > Cellular > Cellular Data. Features: Usage by app, Usage by period, Set data limit, Set warning threshold. Third-party apps: GlassWire, My Data Manager, Data Usage Monitor. LankaTel App provides most accurate carrier-side tracking. Tip: Reset statistics monthly to track current cycle usage.

5G impact on data usage: Speed increase leads to higher consumption. Same video loads faster but uses same data. However: Higher quality content auto-selected (uses more data). Faster loading encourages more browsing. App updates download faster (but same size). Important: 5G does not consume more data for same content. Monitor FUP more closely with 5G as limits reached faster.

Work from home data requirements: Video meetings - 1-2 GB per day (4-6 hours of calls). VPN connection - 100-300 MB per day. Cloud document work - 50-200 MB per day. Email - 50-100 MB per day. Total estimate: 2-4 GB per day for typical remote worker. Recommendation: 50-100 GB monthly plan minimum. Consider LankaTel Work From Home package with unlimited video conferencing.

Set data limits for children: MyLankaTel app > Family > Add Member > Set Data Limit. Available controls: Daily data cap (100MB - 5GB), Time-based restrictions, App-specific blocks, Usage notifications to parent. When limit reached: Child's data paused until next day/reset. Override available via parent app. Block specific data-heavy apps (YouTube, TikTok). Schedule data-free study hours.

Emergency data when balance is zero: Dial *#555# to request data loan. Available loans: 500MB - LKR 50 (plus LKR 10 fee), 1GB - LKR 99 (plus LKR 15 fee). Eligibility: Account active 30+ days, No outstanding loans. Repayment: Auto-deducted from next recharge. Validity: 24 hours from activation. One active loan at a time. Useful for: Emergency browsing, OTP verification, Quick communication.

Data SIM for IoT/smart devices: Available plans: IoT 100MB - LKR 99/month, IoT 500MB - LKR 299/month, IoT 1GB - LKR 499/month. Use cases: Security cameras, GPS trackers, Smart home devices, POS machines, Vending machines. Features: M2M optimized, Low-power network support, Pooled data for multiple devices, Enterprise dashboard for management. No FUP on IoT plans.

Data-only SIM for secondary devices: Same packages as mobile (no voice). Activation: Visit service center with NIC and device. SIM types: Nano, Micro, Standard available. eSIM: Available for compatible tablets/laptops. Sharing option: Share main phone's data pool. Recommendation: Postpaid family plan for multiple devices. Tablet-specific plans coming soon with education bundles.

Can FUP limit be reset early? Standard policy: FUP resets only on billing cycle. Exception: Upgrade to higher plan (immediate FUP increase). Workaround: Purchase data booster for immediate high-speed data. Enterprise customers: Contact account manager for emergency reset. One-time courtesy reset: May be available for long-term customers (call 1234). Note: Cannot downgrade FUP limit mid-cycle.
